I thought you were completely gay tbh.‚Äù; We both laughed and she hugged me and said, ‚ÄúDoes anyone else know?‚Äù; And I replied, ‚ÄúNo. And I don‚Äôt plan to tell anyone anytime soon‚Äù she nodded and zipped her mouth.; We are extremely close and I am completely out and happy as can be that I didn‚Äôt wait until I was older.

title: üçÜ doing its own thing
lede: It's just a body part
story_texts: There have been a number of times when I'm just doing my own thing in life and I'll just suddenly become erect and hard; At first I was self-conscious about it but as it kept happening, it just seemed normal; It's not something I should worry about - of course I have a penis so if it's doing its own thing then that's fine; I remember a time when my friend called me out about it in the middle of a class and everyone laughed including me; I think I would have reacted differently at this age and would've made less of a big deal about it; It's just a body part
link_title: Is It Normal to Get Erections?

title: Avoiding deep talks
lede: It gets me upset when he is ignorant
story_texts: Whenever I try and speak to my partner about something that bother him, he pushes it out of the way and out of his concern; It's because he doesn't like to talk things out; It gets me upset when he is ignorant and makes no effort to change; the only thing he says is that that's how he is and he can't help it.; I try and work out things but it can be very frustrating when you feel like you're the only one trying to make things better
link_title: How to Be a Good Listener

title: Period advice
lede: Stock your freezer with ice cream!
story_texts: One time I got food poisoning and was throwing up the whole day AND really painful cramps. I couldn't move it was horrible!; My mom told me it might be my period and a few months later I got it; It wasn't really that painful but cramps can be bad for some people and some don't get 'em.; Also ADVICE: tell ur parents!! ; Don't wear white on your period!!! If you're playing sports - use a tampon and spandex under your shorts!; Stock your freezer with ice cream if you like that and get lots of chocolate!
link_title: What can I expect when I get my period?

title: Liking someone with a boyfriend
lede: They once went to sneak out and they ended up kissing
story_texts: I have a friend who is 14 and she is the sweetest person ever; This one guy likes her but he has a whole girlfriend and my friend really liked him; They once went to sneak out and they ended up kissing; The girl was so happy but she confronted him and said that what he did was wrong and that he cheated on his girlfriend; Since she told him that, he went and ignored her ever since; She was sad because that was her first love

title: BBF and BF Fights!
lede: They start to fight over my time
story_texts: Well, me and my boyfriend have been dating for a min now; But him and my friend don't get along; So, it's hard when they start to fight over my time

title: Acne's the worst
lede: When I started having acne, I felt less confident.
story_texts: Acne is like seriously the worse; When I started having acne, I felt less confident.; I didn't like how I looked and I tried to hide it as much as possible; Thankfully, I have a few close friends who always have my back and make me feel better; I know there are some treatment you can get for your skin that I'll probably try in the future

title: Getting hurt
lede: She deserves better
story_texts: My friend and I were talking last night about her relationship; She told me she loved that person but that person doesn't treat her how she deserves to be treated; She told me that she knew she was going to get played/hurt; I told her that she settled for less and that she deserved better

title: My boyfriend's my best friend
lede: It's like talking to my boy best friend
story_texts: My boyfriend and I have been dating for almost a month now. He is basically my best friend; But we do have problems every once in a while but we make it work; Having conversations with him is almost like talking to my boy best friend; Sometimes I often ask if he trusts me; But at the end of the day I know that he does even though he gets on my last nerve; Honestly, I've never been able to talk to anyone else the way I can talk to him. Again, he's my best friend

title: Saying things that aren't true
lede: "Watch yourself!"
story_texts: Yesterday I was at a game and girls from the other school liked me; Another girl from my school said "watch yourself because those girls like you and you go with Salome."; But I know that I don't and everyone keeps saying that we do.

title: Crushing on the same girl
lede: I made her a song
story_texts: I really liked this girl and wanted to be with her; So I told her I made her a song; She really liked the song and all but she still didn't want a relationship; Then my cousin came to my school and she liked him and they got together; It really hurt me but I realized that she wasn't the one

title: Boom=kiss
lede: I was flabbergasted
story_texts: So my first kiss was in 7th grade and I was dating this boy.; I was at school and the teacher said they would be back in 20 minutes; So my boyfriend's friend called me in the other room to talk about him; Then my boyfriend just - boom - kissed me and I was flabbergasted

title: Video's puberty vs real life
lede: Around 8th grade, I watched videos about puberty
story_texts: When I was 12 I began puberty and not much happened out of the gate; I noticed my voice changing, a little hair growing, but not much; Around 8th grade, I watched videos about puberty; I've never really been into any type of sexual videos online so it wasn't that; The internet made puberty seem terrible but my experience wasn't so crazy; I think every one's experience is slightly different
link_title: Top Signs You Are a Boy in Puberty

title: Friends vs boyfriends
lede: They are not happy with me because I have a boyfriend
story_texts: I'm in a time in my like where I would wanna start dating and now I talk to my friends about dating someone; But now my friends may act jealous when I date because I don't text them a lot like I do with a boy; Then they are not happy with me because I have a boyfriend but they told me to go for it; Now they are mad at me??!; Then I start thinking about not having relationships‚Ä¶

title: Phones only
lede: We didn't talk to each other at all when we saw each other at school
story_texts: This boy and I started off as friends but like a month later we started dating; The relationship was weird because we didn't talk to each other at all when we saw each other at school; But, we were always on the phone; I started hearing rumors about him cheating so we broke up be we still texted eachother and flirted; I would get mad whenever he didn't answer my calls or text me back. I was so confused because I didn't know if I wanted him or not.; Even though we texted and FaceTimed, we still never talked in person. So I wonder if he ever liked me at all

title: Girl puberty=blood
lede: No one can judge you because every female has it
story_texts: For a female, when you think of puberty you think blood down there mostly; The cramps are harsh, you get really self aware and stressed out when the time comes; No one can judge you because every female has it

title: Oily Skin
lede: my glasses almost slide right off my face!
story_texts: My nose is very oily almost all of the time and I think that is contributing to me having pimples one after the other; I wash my face with hot water every morning and night but after a while, it just gets oily again; It's espeically annoying when I have on my glasses and I'm looking down at something but then my glasses almost slide off of my face!; I honestly don't have any solutions to deal with this problem
link_title: Tips for Taking Care of Your Skin

title: Only liking you as a friend
lede: He was like my best friend
story_texts: I was really close with this boy and he was like my best friend; Then one day he told me he liked me and I didn't like him back; So I didn't know how to tell him so I told one of my other friends to tell him; Now we are not close anymore
link_title: How to Talk to Girls, Boys and Everyone in Between

title: Spontaneous Boners
lede: I was afraid that my teacher was going to call on me
story_texts: I was asleep in class and when I woke up I had a boner; I was afraid that my teacher was going to call on me to come to the board; When she did call on me, it was the end of class and we had to transition; So I just packed up and left the room with my backpack in front of me
link_title: Is It Normal to Get Erections?

title: Relationships unestablished
lede: He gets upset and offended as if he's my boyfriend
story_texts: I met this boy from a mutual friend; And we became friends and we talked pretty much all day, every day; But we don't date; But whenever somebody talks to me, he gets upset and offended as if he's my boyfriend; I don't know what to do

title: Painful Period
lede: As I got older, the cramps got very hard to deal with
story_texts: When I was 12 I received my first period; I didn't know what that meant but my mom did so I told her and she helped me out over the years; As I got older, the cramps got very hard to deal with: mood swings, hardly being able to walk, extreme headaches and heavy bleeding; The cramp pain began to make me weak and barely able to walk ; I chose to take medicine and drink tea which calms the pain (raspberry is the best)

title: Mom tripping out
lede: Maybe I'll tell her how I feel
story_texts: My mom always tries to put me down when I do something really small; I honestly feel like she trips a lot for nothing because I could most definitely be doing worse things (drugs, sex, etc.); But I will continue to respect her and maybe tell her how I feel

title: Crushing with skittles
lede: "are you guys dating??"
story_texts: So there's this boy, I've been friends with him for three years. Lately I've been catching feelings, thinking about him, and mostly how cute he is!; You know that feeling you don't want to ruin that friendship. I'm just like that!!; I told this one friend about him. I trust her more than anything ! I told her a little story about me and him.; What happened was...during 7th period, I was sitting down and later he came in class and sat in front of me where he didn't usually sit. Time went by and someone brought skittles in a jar.; He saw it, so did i. We both took a handful of it and we both sat down. He put his head down on my desk, so I got one of my skittles and put it in his mouth. He got back up and ate it.; Later someone told us " are you guys dating?" We both said "no" but in my head I told myself that "I wish bro!!"

title: STD videos... oh no!
lede: I was terrified and wanted to leave so badly
story_texts: So I was given this permission slip for the sex ed thing that was pretty important, I kinda thought about it; I kinda already knew about my body, you know, periods, hair growth, discharge and other stuff. I decided to go though; But when I got there, instead of talking about the female body, they ended up talking about STDs and AIDS; Also, the male body and how they should put on a condom in a certain way; I was terrified and wanted to leave so badly. Now I don't wanna date a guy; I don't wanna date anyone. I just wanna be a crazy dog lady
link_title: STD Prevention & Testing: Just the Facts

title: People putting you down
lede: They throw stuff and they punch and kick my seat
story_texts: Every day for school, I ride the bus; Everyone on that bus wants to put me down; They are annoying and make a lot of noise; They throw stuff and they punch and kick my seat; I feel like I am being oppressed by the people who are on this bus

title: Feeling betrayed
lede: All of the sudden, the guy cursed me out
story_texts: I was friends with a girl for about 2 years and she ended up liking this guy; I was friends with him so I helped them talk to each other (they were nervous) ; They ended up dating; All of the sudden, the guy cursed me out; She took his side because he's her boyfriend and I felt betrayed

title: First wet dream
lede: I guess I was supposed to feel something tingly down there
story_texts: The first time I had a wet dream, I was 13.; At first when I woke up I was just quiet and laughing at myself for dreaming that.; It was just a dream to me... until I told me mom.; She thought I was watching porn; But I wasn't, I just had a dream; She asked me how my stomach felt, I said fine; I guess I was supposed to feel something tingly down there

title: Flirty texts
lede: But she send me texts and they are flirty texts
story_texts: Me and a girl named Shayleen dated for 6 months and right now she wants to be friends or take a break; But she send me texts and they are flirty texts; So I don't know if she wants to date again; And I do not have enough courage to ask her out or not

title: Oily Skin
lede: I tried everything to get rid of it
story_texts: I've always worried about how I look or my appearance; So, when I hit puberty around age 12 and started getting pimples, I tried everything to get rid of it.; My nose stayed oily and I constantly tried to wipe it off; I put on face masks and clean my face every night; I sometimes wear foundation to hide my pimples and oily skin; I also stopped drinking soda to try to clean my skin up more

title: Dating someone much older
lede: I have never liked guys my age
story_texts: As a mature teenager I have never liked guys my age; My boyfriends have always been older; Well my recent boyfriends is a lot older than me; I love him because he loves me for me; He is fun, smart, and kind.; We are currently 218 miles and 3 1/2 hours from each other so our relationship is built on trust and love

title: Falling for your best friend
lede: I'm not sure what to do or how to feel
story_texts: I feel like I'm falling in love with my best friend. The issue is that I still love my boyfriend. I'm not sure what to do or how to feel. It's like my heart is being pulled every direction possible..me and him have been dating for almost a year now. God, what do I do?; I'm so unsure of how to feel or even how to fix this. I'm normally never this lovesick but I guess I have to feel all of this now all at once.; I've never told them how I feel but I know they know and I know they feel the same way too.; I'm always there for them when they're angry, upset, even bored. I've said, "I love you" and they always say "I love you too."; They get kind of shy when they say, "I love you too." I know they mean it though and that makes me see happy. I just don't understand why this has to be so damn difficult.; I'm terrified of being alone and it's just not fair. I haven't told them I want them as much as I actually do. I'm not strong or confident enough to.

title: Blocked by a BFF
lede: My friendship was ruined because of a boy
story_texts: My friendship was ruined because of a boy. I told my best friend that this boy is not right for you but you can still like him.. I just gave her my opinion. ; A week later he told me to tell my best friend that he doesn‚Äôt like her. I tried to tell my best friend that he doesn‚Äôt like her and she just blocked me out. I should‚Äôve not been in there business but I was.; I kept texting telling her that I‚Äôm sorry and I want to be BEST FRIENDS again. She says yes every single time.; But in the next day of school she blocks me out again. She told me "I just want to be friends". I told her that I can‚Äôt be just friends after all she did to me. ; I told her about how many times she hurt my feeling called me fat, told me my pants were ugly and more. So I hurt her feelings ONCE and she takes the advantage of that.; I kept asking to be her best friend again but she just left me alone. On the last day of school she says will you be my friend again. I said no

title: Your pace
lede: He said he ‚Äúwanted me‚Äù and I couldn‚Äôt tell if he meant sexually or not
story_texts: Last night my boyfriend wanted to come over (more like sneak over TBH) because he said he ‚Äúwanted me‚Äù and I couldn‚Äôt tell if he meant sexually or not; So I asked; He said that I ‚Äúmade him super hard‚Äù and that he would be happy to do ‚Äúwhatever I wanted‚Äù; He never talks like this and we‚Äôve only been together a month; We‚Äôre both virgins and we haven‚Äôt really talked about sex very much; I want to give him what what he wants but last night, I just don‚Äôt think I was as into it as he was; I told him I was tired and that we should wait and he was super respectful about it; He‚Äôs a good boyfriend and you should always be with someone who respects your choices and the pace you want to go at
link_title: Talking with your partner about sex

title: Feeling respected
lede: But this time I said no to sex
story_texts: I had been talking to this guy for about 4 months and I never expected for it to go anywhere significant. We message on Snapchat daily and my intentions were to be friends with him not really anything more; Our messages slowly got steamier and I became attracted to him but only in time for him to graduate; I felt a part of me was missing but I didn‚Äôt know what this feeling was; One day I was just talking to him and I realized I really f*cking liked him; He came back into town from college that next October to see family and we ended up hooking up during the night; He came back into town again and we met up again and made out for a while but this time I said no to sex; I decided that this time I didn‚Äôt want anything more than just kissing and guess what he said???; ‚ÄúOh that‚Äôs totally cool‚Äù; I was genuinely surprised he took it so cool and I‚Äôm so glad he never pressured me! ; That is definitely how a man should treat someone and I felt so respected.

title: Sexuality on the internet
lede: The internet doesn‚Äôt really help you figure out your feelings
story_texts: I‚Äôve been questioning my sexuality for a while; I didn‚Äôt really get the type of answer I was looking for because it‚Äôs not really easy to just decide how to define myself; I used the internet but basically to look up different sexualities and take some quizzes; I got correct info about sexualities but it wasn‚Äôt super helpful. The internet doesn‚Äôt really help you figure out your feelings; It‚Äôs hard with this kind of stuff because I don‚Äôt want to out myself to my parents or family but I want help deciding... I have a couple friends I‚Äôm out to as questioning and they‚Äôre supportive but idk how much they can help; They‚Äôre my age and they‚Äôll prob just say something like ‚Äúoh you‚Äôll figure it out‚Äù and it‚Äôs stressful
link_title: Info and Resources for LGBTQ Teens and Allies

title: New crush
lede: I used to believe that having a crush was stupid until he came along
story_texts: Having a crush is hard; I have one his name is Brad; I like him cause he makes me feel special and because he makes me smile when I am upset; He believes in me; I used to believe that having a crush was stupid until he came along; He likes me for me and when you find your crush you'll feel alive and happy

title: Spinning first kiss
lede: He said it tasted like ice cream
story_texts: One day I went to the Anchor Fest nearby and my mom let me bring my boyfriend; And we were on a ride and it was spinning; So then we had our first kiss; And I puked in his mouth and he said it tasted like ice cream; I had just ate ice cream so that's probably why

title: Not really my friend
lede: I felt like she totally betrayed my trust
story_texts: A ‚Äúfriend‚Äù of mine was spreading a rumor around the school claiming that I was pregnant. She did this because she was mad that I had sex with a boy that she and I both talk to.; I was upset because I felt like she totally betrayed my trust, and everyone believed it.; She thought I wouldn‚Äôt find out; I asked her if it was true that she was the one spreading it because it‚Äôs not okay to spread rumors at all, especially about something so serious.; She tried to deny it at first. She later said that she did it because she was jealous of me yet she refused to apologize or try to make things right.; I decided that she was not the type of person I wanted in my life.

title: My boyfriend cheated
lede: Some friends of mine that go to his school sent me pictures of him with other girls
story_texts: So I dated this guy and things were really good. We were only talking for a couple weeks before we started dating; I knew I rushed into it but I really really liked him so I thought why not?; We dated for a month until I found out he cheated on me. Some friends of mine that go to his school sent me pictures of him with other girls; Whenever I asked him about it he wouldn't answer. I broke up with him because I felt very used and I trusted him with everything. He was the first guy I really "did" anything with and it hurt so bad to let him go; I still see him a lot because we are both in dance outside of school. It hurts me a lot because even though I hate him because he cheated, I would still take him back and I really do love him. He's moved on and I'm still sad.; Some nights I cry myself to sleep and I just want everyone to know that cheating is a terrible thing and if you got cheated on, just know you're not alone. It sucks
link_title: Am I in a Healthy Relationship?

title: Bipolar Disorder and Relationships
lede: I had been dating this guy for about a week when my episode kicked in
story_texts: I‚Äôm Bi-Polar and I thought I‚Äôd share one of my stories revolving around my episodes. Back in July of 2017, I was in a pretty short, and minor depressive state, or rather I was more numb then depressed. I had been dating this guy for about a week when my episode kicked in but he thought nothing of it. ; He liked the idea of taking care of me and I liked the idea of having someone who was making sure I didn‚Äôt do anything stupid. Our relationship was incredibly smooth which was impressive for me because I‚Äôve always had trouble with relationships up until that point. ; I eventually wound up in an incredibly extreme manic episode which led to him and I fighting a lot. In the back of my mind I felt horrible but I had no control over the words coming out of my mouth or my actions. After about a month and a half we split up which was for the best because I had hurt him too much while in my manic state; I don‚Äôt take medication and I don‚Äôt plan to either but since splitting I‚Äôve begun more calming exercises like meditation to cope with my emotions and it seems to be working.; If I could do it again though, I would have calmed myself before anything serious could happen. I understand it‚Äôs not all that easy for most others suffering from bipolar disorder to cope but I urge you to try it before you start medication.; Him and I are still close friends and he continues to be a major part of my life. Since splitting up I‚Äôve been in a relationship with someone who is also bipolar, we‚Äôre about at our 5 month anniversary funnily enough.

title: Feelings for a friend
lede: I would get nervous and stuff around him
story_texts: Every day is a new struggle. ; It's a new feeling and a new sensation in your body everyday.; You are always thriving to be the best. Always thriving to fit in.; So, this guy was like my best friend and I started to have feelings for him; I would get nervous and stuff around him and I am debating whether or not to tell him; I feel sad and don't know what to do

title: Lying girlfriend
lede: But ever since they started dating he's been ignoring me
story_texts: I have a crush on my best friend but he has a gf that apparently cheated on him ; But she lied and said that he was just a friend so that my bff wouldn't break up with her; I've told him and he's told me several times that we want to be with each other and we love each other so much; But ever since they started dating he's been ignoring me and I have to make him talk to me; But I guess that's getting kind of better; But we still want to be with each other and he knows that it's hurting me so I don't know what to do

title: How do u say no to society?
lede: It doesn‚Äôt matter what race, gender or sexuality you are
story_texts: Okay so I‚Äôm a part of the LGBTQ community; So me and my gf were at the mall and we were walking around holdings hands. I felt kinda weird because she‚Äôs my first gf. So anyways we were walking and this old man out of no where says ew. I started to freak out inside so i stopped holding her hand; That same day we went to a school dance and a slow song came on and we started dancing. While we were dancing I felt uncomfortable because I thought people were judging me because I was dancing with a girl; The thing is no one knows that I‚Äôm bisexual and I feel like people are going to make fun of me because of it; So that night after the dance we went home and she texted me that she had a great time and that after the slow dance she wanted to kiss me. I replied with ‚ÄúI‚Äôm glad you had a great time. I‚Äôm just not ready for the whole public thing yet.‚Äù; I felt awful because she wants to be a ‚Äúpublic couple‚Äù but I‚Äôm not ready yet; I just want society to be okay with love; It doesn‚Äôt matter what race, gender or sexuality you are
link_title: Love is Love: Free to be Me

title: Unsatisfied
lede: It's very hard to find another dude
story_texts: I really want another male partner (I‚Äôm a guy); But it‚Äôs very hard to find another dude who I know would like me in my area; I look good, it‚Äôs just that I don‚Äôt think anyone else is out; Anyone I‚Äôm aware of; I feel a bit unsatisfied. Like there‚Äôs something missing; I never told anyone this before; Whenever i tell anyone, they think that I would just be complaining about a problem that doesn‚Äôt exist; This is definitely unhealthy; Because it doesn‚Äôt make me feel good

title: One Morning
lede: I woke up one morning with so much acne
story_texts: I woke up one morning with so much acne and I told my mom about it; And she said "you are starting puberty."; I asked what it was and there was so much info about it; And now every night and every morning I have to clean my face with face wash and get rid of pimples and face oil and dirt; But you have to keep your face clean to not get pimples, acne, dirt, or oil on your face

title: Pressured to Date
lede: I haven't felt ready
story_texts: I feel as though people often end up "dating" because society or social media says to; I see people in an unhealthy relationship often.; It's also nice seeing people who say no or wait until it's a better time.; I've never been in a real relationship because I haven't felt ready. ; It's okay not to be in a relationship or do what your friends tell you to do; We as teens need to learn how to protect our hearts and do what feels right

title: Finding My Gender Identity
lede: There were so many signs
story_texts: When I was younger, I never consciously questioned sexuality. But I knew something was wrong. There were so many signs now that I look back.; In 6th grade was when hate for my own body and being referred to as female began. I tried so many methods to appear more male and come out; I was filled with denial and didn't face much acceptance from my family and friends, as expected.; Now nearly everyone correctly genders me. Everyone comes around in the end.; Now I‚Äôm fourteen, and in a year I will have an opportunity too begin HRT (hormone replacement therapy).; It‚Äôs difficult nearly every day, but it will always improve.
link_title: All About Sex, Gender, and Gender Identity

title: Third wheel
lede: I was like Steve from Stranger Things
story_texts: I have a friend who was dating someone; I was friends with them both; However, they always went on dates together but in order for them to go, they needed a friend to go too; I was like Steve from Stranger Things- a nanny to these two love birds. ; Overall, it was insanely awkward and let me just say: when they broke up, I wasn't extremely upset

title: Choices, choices
lede: I really like both of them but I don't know who to choose
story_texts: So I have a crush on Shaun and Kevin! ; I really like both of them but I don't know who to choose; They are both really cute, also I don't know if they like me back or not; I've kissed one of them but we are still just friends; Then the other one I almost held hands with; Man this is so hard who do I choose? They both live close by so it's so hard to choose!

title: Needing deodorant
lede: I wondered why I never realized the stench before
story_texts: One day, I went shopping with me mom and for some reason, I wanted to smell my mom's armpits, so I did; They smelt soooo bad, so I wondered if my armpits smelled that bad; I smelled my armpits and they smelled worse than my mom's; I wondered why I never realized the stench before; While we were shopping, I made sure to buy deodorant

title: The unsuccessful proposal
lede: I saw this girl and I fell in love
story_texts: So, I am LGBTQIA. I saw this girl and I fell in love; She was gorgeous, kind, and in my age range.; However, she is also straight so I had no chance. Yet I still prepared a proposal; It went like this: "Lynn, I was in love with you from the minute I saw you and while nationwide may not be on your side, I will always be. Lynn, will you be my girlfriend?"; She said no, but she said she was very touched

title: Boundaries
lede: Do you want to kiss him?
story_texts: When I was in seventh grade, I had a boyfriend (we'd been together for a year and a half); We went on a field trip to a fondue place with our entire school. Me and him sat at a table with two of his friends; Most girls in our grade had been pressuring us to kiss and when we were walking there, they were taking snapchats of us and posted them; We sat down and the two girls we sat with kept asking "do you want to kiss him?" to me or her for him; He finally broke down and just said "I have a plan"

title: Acne Wash
lede: It made my face turn pink
story_texts: The first time I tried acne face wash, my mom was standing right next to me; And it was really awkward; The stuff I put on my face made my face turn pink; It was so...; minty

title: Mental Health
lede: It is really confusing and scary
story_texts: During puberty and middle school, things get confusing; You have to face things like depression and other mental health issues; I have multiple friends with mental health issues and it is really confusing and scary; But you should always seek help if you need it

title: Shipped
lede: I get angry because I want to just be friends
story_texts: I have been going to my church almost my entire life, but in 6th and part of 7th grade, I felt like I didn't know anyone even though they'd been in my life for years; Eventually, I started hanging out with a few of the boys because I found I had a lot in common with them; Now, I'm a social butterfly in my youth group but still mostly hang out with a couple guys; My younger brother, seeing us together, says he "ships" me with one of them.; I get angry because I want to just be friends, but do I have feelings for him?; I don't want to date until the end of HS. What do I do?

title: Crushing on girls
lede: I've never thought like this before
story_texts: I have a crush on a girl?; I've never had much luck with my crushes but I met this girl at a party and I might like her?; I've never thought like this before, I don't really know; I'm a female by the way and I have considered dating girls, but I've never liked a girl fully (I've told a few people); I don't know what this is but. Oh well.

title: Walking with growing pain
lede: It only happened for half a week
story_texts: One day after soccer practice I got out of the car and I felt like I couldn't walk; I thought I sprained my knee but my dad told me I had growing pains; It only happened for half a week; But it happens once in a while now
link_title: What a Pain! Kids and Growing Pains

title: Peer Pressure
lede: I wasn't ready to date him
story_texts: I liked his boy but everyone wanted us together and I wasn't ready to date him; But because I wanted approval of my friends, I dated him for a little; It just didn't feel right so I told him I just want to be friends

title: Sexual Dreams
lede: It's like I can't control them
story_texts: I have had sexual dreams lately; It feels weird like I shouldn't have them; It's like I can't control them; I know it's normal to have sexual dreams but it doesn't feel like it
link_title: Is it normal to dream about sex?

title: Feeling Great in a Relationship
lede: He adores me
story_texts: I met this guy and I really liked him. He always liked my posts and I liked his and later I found out he went to my school; We started dating after a couple of months of talking; He made and still makes me forget about all the bad in the world; He is a couple of months younger than me but he's really mature. Every time we text he tells me the things he likes about me and how he adores me.; Unlike his previous girlfriends, I keep trust, honesty, and many more in the relationship and he does the same; His love, passion, honesty, care, and life, is more than anything I could ask for

title: Full on Relationship?
lede: I don't know what I'll say
story_texts: This boy said that he liked me. I liked him back but I didn't want to have a full on relationship yet.; Then, a couple of days later, another girl (who wasn't that nice) asked him out; I had noticed before that they hung out but didn't think it was a big deal; I still wasn't that upset about it, more confused; Then 2 days later she broke up with him saying he was "too quiet"; He still hasn't asked me out and I don't know what I'll say if he does

title: My First Signs of Acne
lede: A pimple was inside of my nostril
story_texts: Earlier this year I noticed bumps on my face; About a week later it turned into acne; The worst part was that I was sick and a pimple was inside of my nostril; So, tissues burned even worse than normal; Acne isn't so bad after a few weeks

title: Feelings and Emotions
lede: I'm very confused
story_texts: I have started to be more emotional.; Somedays I will feel super happy and then a second later I feel like I want to cry or scream; I would like to know if it is normal; I also have been thinking about boyfriends or girlfriends; I am a girl and might like girls but I'm very confused and I don't know how to tell my mom or dad; This is just the beginning but it is very confusing

title: A Forced Relationship
lede: I wanted to say no
story_texts: One time this boy asked me out in 7th grade. We were friends, but I didn't like him like that; I wanted to say no, but my friends and everyone else were so excited and I felt bad, so I said yes; I wanted to break up with him but it took me nearly nine months before I got my nerve up to do it; Those nine months were so horrible for me.; My friends would always tease me about him, and my parents would always ask about him; One day I just completely broke down and told my mom that I never liked him and she and my friends helped me be prepared to break up with him and I finally did

title: Just starting
lede: I just know it'll happen
story_texts: I haven't had my period yet but I've had a bit of acne already; I've started using deodorant; My mom said that I'll start my period soon and I've already started with my mood swings; I just know it'll happen and I'll have family and friends to help me through it

title: An unhealthy relationship
lede: I didn't feel good about it
story_texts: My ex-boyfriend never actually asked me out; I was almost "forced" to date him but I was happy (I guess); But when he kept asking me to kiss him and not stopping, I broke it off because I didn't feel good about it

title: Huge bumps
lede: Wondering what names I would be called at school
story_texts: One day, I was taking my shower; I was washing my face and I noticed these huge bumps on my cheek, nose, and forehead ; I started freaking out, wondering what names I would be called at school; However, no one teased me; I put special ointment on them and now they are hardly noticeable

title: I love you?
lede: How do you really know what love is?
story_texts: I was in relationships with many girls but it was not all at once; One girl kept on saying "I love you" but I didn't say it back; I didn't say it back because how do you really know what love is?; I know what it is but how are you loving and you are only in 8th grade?; Also, you don't have your own house or your own car; Also, look at your age, how old are you?

title: Period at Camp
lede: I was scared at first
story_texts: My period started at sleep away camp and it was not fun; It started over night and I want to the bathroom and saw blood in my underwear; I was scared at first and my friend that was there already had hers so she helped me and told me to tell an adult to help me; So I did and at the time my hormones kicked in so I was crying; I then called my mom and she told me what to do. I luckily had supplies so I was prepared
link_title: What can I expect when I get my period?

title: First Date
lede: She hypothetically asked me if I would go out
story_texts: I just got my friends phone number. My friend was a girl; Later that night we were playing "five questions" with texts and she hypothetically asked me if I would go out, I said yes; So she asked for real and I said yes; We broke up 4 or 5 days later
link_title: How to Talk to Girls, Boys and Everyone in Between

title: Difficult Friends
lede: I always have a headache when I'm around her
story_texts: I have this friend who doesn't know her limits sometimes. ; She can be so loud even when I ask her to quiet down. She talks about people and then is all nice to them the next day; She lies about so many things. It's not hard to know when she lies or takes something. ; She does think she is nice to me and my friends but really, she can be so rude.; She always tries to pick fights. Honestly, I always have a headache when I'm around her.; You know when she's not at school because it's more quiet than usual. She thinks she's the coolest of them all. Sometimes I wish she would just take a chill pill
link_title: What It Means to Be a Friend

title: The agony of acne
lede: I was horrified to see two little pink spots on my nose
story_texts: One day, just like any other day, I looked in the mirror; I was horrified to see two little pink spots on my nose; Quickly I scrubbed my face but they didn't go away, they just got redder; Later that night at my friend's birthday party, I noticed other people had these struggles and sometimes even more severe

title: School dance
lede: I told him to give me some time to think about it
story_texts: I was in 5th grade and there was going to be a school dance; A boy asked me out to go to the dance and I told him to give me some time to think about it; He kept asking me when I said I needed time to think.; Finally, I told him "no" on last time and he stopped asking me.

title: Awkward Questions
lede: Will they judge you?
story_texts: A lot of the time I am asked by someone if I have a girlfriend.; It is an awkward question to be asked. ; Will they judge you?; Normally, if it is another younger person, like in middle school, it can be weird and they might judge you; Most adults won't; If you don't want to talk about it, just say no

title: Periods and Divorce
lede: Then she realized home was with her dad
story_texts: My parents are divorced. So are my friend's parents.; My friend went to go visit her dad in New York and go to a volleyball camp. ; Her first day in volleyball camp was going well...until she felt something wet and went to the bathroom to check it out; Turns out she started her period. She wrapped toilet paper around her underwear until she got home.; Then she realized home was with her dad. How embarressing!; She told her dad and he got his girlfriend to talk to her about it. That would suck
link_title: My mom isn't around. How can I talk to my dad about periods and other girl stuff?

title: Unwanted Behavior
lede: One of them grabbed her butt
story_texts: I have a friend that has a boyfriend. ; But these two boys bother her; One of them grabbed her butt when he was hugging her.; And the other one hugged her when she didn't want her to and then he said "you have nice boobs"

title: Pain at the gym
lede: I take ibuprofen
story_texts: Every time I go to the gymnasium we do fun things but I have lots of pains; In my arms, wrists, ankles, and especially shins; I am not sure if my friends have them but it really hurts especially when we do front flips because the floor is not so bouncy and they hurt my shins; I take ibuprofen but since I go to the gymnasium 4 times a week, I am scared it is bad for me!

title: First Kiss
lede: we leaned in and kissed
story_texts: For my first kiss we were in a museum-hotel with our other friend and we hid behind a curtain for 45 minutes; About 20 minutes in we leaned in and kissed; It was really nice; We kissed four more times and then went back to our other friend, who was sitting on their phone; I was distracted thinking about it for the next three days

title: My first boner
lede: I woke up with a really huge boner
story_texts: I was 10 years old when I was sleeping and I woke up with a really huge boner; But I didn't notice because I was too tired; But then my mom woke up and wanted to go talk to me but when she did, she saw my penis and yelled to put some pants on; I got scared and ran away
link_title: Is It Normal to Get Erections?

title: Breaking up
lede: it was really hard to
story_texts: In 7th grade, I had a boyfriend and we were dating for a very long time; He was very controlling and he would get mad about everything; And so I broke up with him and it was really hard to; It hurt a lot and was sad because I didn't know how and when to do it

title: My brother's relationship
lede: But the person he is dating changes constantly
story_texts: I have a brother who is dating someone but it is very strange from my perspective because my brother is a male and identifies as one and is straight.; But the person he is dating changes constantly; I can't really identify what they identify as but they (I don't want to use she or he) have identified as a lesbian female before, but more recently as a male.; It is a very complicated relationship; But I'm probably not given every bit of information so it's likely working fine.
link_title: Being Female, Male, Transgender or Fluid

title: Excuses
lede: He would get so angry at me
story_texts: There was a guy who liked me and I liked him too; But he would never talk to me in person, but he would get so angry at me whenever I talked to anyone else, not even in a flirty way; He was so jealous all the time and then he would dumb excuses to get me to pity him.; It was so annoying; I got so fed up

title: Talking with my parents
lede: It is very hard to just talk one on one about stuff with my parents
story_texts: It is very hard to just talk one on one about stuff with my parents; When I am alone with them I get very tense and always scared; I can't wait for the day I can.

title: The secret's out
lede: She told the guy that I liked him
story_texts: So, this new girls came to school and she saw me flirting with this guy that I like; She told the guy that I liked him and he kinda looked at me. ; I ran out of the room when the bell rang and I was trying to get my stuff when he leaned up against my locker.; He said, "it's okay." I said "No it's not she shouldn't have told you.; "Why," he replied, "I like you too." Then he walked away; I was so happy but now he treats me kinda like a friend. What happened?
link_title: How to Talk to Girls, Boys and Everyone in Between

title: Loving yourself
lede: I am still trying to completely love myself little by little
story_texts: When growing up, you never want to be the odd one out but sadly I felt like I always was; One of the factors that made me feel that way was my height. I was always the tallest girl or person in the class.; Now I'm 14 and I'm still one of the tallest but I've learned something important; To be able to love yourself you even need to love the part of you that makes you different.; I am still trying to completely love myself little by little but why should my height stop me from that?; I'm 5 feet 9 1/2 inches and I wear heels to school making me almost 6 feet tall and I love it. Never let anything make you dislike yourself even if people don't like you for it.
link_title: Why don't I like the way I look?

title: Turning someone down
lede: We had a lot in common but I didn't have feelings for him
story_texts: Last year in the 7th grade, I heard from my friend that this guy had a crush on me.; I'm the type to focus on school first before relationships so I didn't think much of it.; He turned out to be a close friend of my cousin and had tutoring the same day I had my club. After my club and his tutoring, we both waited outside for our rides; He was really sweet and pretty dorky and we had a lot in common but I didn't have feelings for him. He had messaged me on Facebook that night and asked me out.; I tried to be polite and I turned him down. The next day at school, it was really awkward around him and word got around his and my friend groups that I turned him down.; My cousin started some drama and told him that I liked him. We managed to settle that lie but now we don't talk anymore.
link_title: Someone Is Spreading Rumors About Me. What Can I Do?

title: Crush clueless
lede: I can't tell him because I'm too nervous
story_texts: I have a crush on this boy; I can't tell him because I'm too nervous; Most of the time I'm clueless; I honestly don't know what to do
link_title: How to Talk to Girls, Boys and Everyone in Between

title: Words harm
lede: You look in the mirror and you no longer see yourself
story_texts: Isn't it weird how everyone tells you that you are perfect just the way you are, that you don't need to change and you shouldn't want to?; But then behind your back people will tell you about how "ugly" or "imperfect" you are. About how you need to change and you shouldn't change.; You hear people's thoughts and suddenly they become your own; You look in the mirror and you no longer see yourself. You see all the things you dislike, you don't see yourself. You don't know who you are anymore; People say things- cruel, harmful things- sometimes it goes far, so far, they think it's harmless but now you think you're fat and you don't need food- you don't want food; They don't know what you do behind the closed doors of the bathroom. So tell me: are their words harmless?

title: Nervous first kiss
lede: He just kissed me!
story_texts: Oh girl! Guess what!?; A couple of weeks ago I had my first kiss!; Before it happened I was super nervous and scared; When I was getting ready to have a panic attack, he just kissed him!; I was so excited!

title: My friend's brother
lede: I had a crush on him
story_texts: I was staying the night at a friends and her brother is a little older than me; I had a crush on him; He would flirt with me and vice versa.; And after a few years we started to cuddle and stuff; But I always had this feeling when I was around him

title: My crush's note
lede: One box said yes and one said no
story_texts: In 7th grade I had a crush on this girl and one day she told me she liked me. I didn't really know what to say or do because we were both in relationships.; So one day I broke up with my girlfriend and waited for her relationship to end. Eventually they did break up but I was still scared to ask her out. ; Until one day she wrote me a note that said will you go out with me with two boxes. ; One box said yes and one said no but she wouldn't let me see the note so I took it from her.; I checked the yes box; and when I came back she wouldn't look at me. I told her I put yes and asked her if she wanted me to get rid of the note. ; She said yes so I did and now we have been together for 2 years and 8 months.

title: Wanting my period
lede: I felt more like a woman
story_texts: Ever since I was ten years old I wanted my period becuase it seemed like all my friends had theirs; Everyone always told me to be glad that I didn't have it yet; It was September 25th and I was 12 and finally started my period; I felt more like a woman but I was nervous about bleeding through at school or trying tampons, but once I got used to it I realized that it is completely natural. ; To avoid bleeding through, I just pack extra underwear and pants.; I also use pads with wings or a pantyliner with a tampon

title: Siblings in my business
lede: It would be nice for them to be out of the way
story_texts: So every time I try to do something with my girlfriend alone- like on a walk or something- my brother and sister are always in the way asking to go with us; Yes, I love them to death but it would be nice for them to be out of the way or to not bother me every time I leave or do something; That's not all; Even in private conversations with my mom  they always want to find a better way to get in trouble or learn something that they don't need to know

title: First Kiss
lede: One of them says "prove it"
story_texts: So I was helping my boyfriend with work and he suggested that I try out for a play; I have stage-fright so I compromised by joinng crew for a play.; I was backstage with him and our friends and something didn't believe we were dating cause we were both guys; After a few minutes of trying to convince our friends that we were in fact dating, one of them says "prove it"; So I'm expecting a kiss on the cheek or something of the sort but no- he kisses me right on the lips; I was surprised and I think I enjoyed it but was too shocked then to realize it.

title: Changing Weight
lede: It's your body, not there's
story_texts: A couple of years ago a friend of mine was so worried about being fat or not skinny enough. i had another friend who was worrying too. ; Just saying- there is nothing wrong with being a plus size; I decided that they to learn about how to not care about what people think about your size.; A couple months pass by and I find out one of my friends eats but then puke it back up. That's not health and she needed healthy. ; So I helped her and we both went on a small diet together so that I could show her that you don't have to put yourself in danger just so you can lose weight.; I also helped my other friend realize it doesn't matter what other people think about your body- it's your body, not there's.

title: Forbidden Dreams
lede: I didn't know if it was a fantasy or a nightmare
story_texts: The first time I had a sexual dream it was more weird than plessurable; By weird, I mean I didn't know how to feel; The person I was with was forbidden (partly from society's views and partly from law); So at first, I didn't know how I should feel.; I didn't know if it was a fantasy or a nightmare

title: Dealing with acne
lede: It usually happens the worst when my cycle is on or about to come on
story_texts: I have really bad acne. It pops up mostly on my cheeks; It usually happens the worst when my cycle is on or about to come on; I get rid of my pimples by washing my face in the morning and at night, and for the big pimples I mix baking soda and vinegar with a little water into a paste and put it on for about 5-10 minutes minutes every night until they go away; I just learned to embrace my acne because I love me regardless

title: Hey parents!
lede: I think that when I ask something they don't acknowledge me
story_texts: I don't feel like my parents care about what I care about; I think that when I ask something they don't acknowledge me; When I ask them a question they act like they don't hear me

title: Dealing with Acne on Your Period
lede: My doctor said it was part of the cycle of growing up
story_texts: When I was 12, I started to get all these small bumps on my face. I started to notice some other changes in my body; When my period first came, I had horrible cramps and I had to get checked out; My doctor said that is was part of the cycle of growing up and that many girls get it at 13 or younger; Since then I had used a lot of creams for my acne but nothing takes the bumps away so I try to consume less sugary things because that's one reason why acne occurs.; Over time my cramps got less harsh but they do cause my mood to change.; Some girls even become more aggressive when they are on their's but I don't. I tend to be more calm and quiet.

title: Hair everywhere
lede: Everything grows so quickly
story_texts: Once you hit the magical number 13, a lot happens. ; Hair happens too.; You get more hair on your legs, arm pits, stomach and other places I cannot name.; You routinely have to shave which takes me sooo long; My legs and armpits are most important since everything grows so quickly

title: Do I even know what love is?
lede: But I "loved" him
story_texts: When I was in 7th grade I met this guy Bob. We first met when we were in band class together.; And one day my friend said "An 8th grader likes you!" I was thinking it was the guy and he said "yes".; So later I was talking to Bob and he said "I really like you but I have a girlfriend." I stopped talking to him after that. ; 3 months go by and they break up so we start talking. Next year he went to highschool and I was in middle school still.; We were on and off talked but I "loved" him.; So I get o high school and we start talking again. Then we finally go out after 3 years... only for it to end in 4 days!

title: Bumps on my face
lede: They sometimes hurt which is really annoying
story_texts: For a while now, I have been getting acne all over my face but it doesn't take effect all at once; Most of the time when one occurs, there aren't many others, but they may be there for a while; They sometimes hurt which is really annoying; I bought things for my face to clean it and get a lot of oil off of it but we'll see what happens

title: 9-year old catastrophe
lede: I went to use the bathroom and panicked
story_texts: One day in the summer after 3rd grade my stomach was hurting terribly.; I didn't know why but I kept reminding my mom. ; After another hour or so I went to use the bathroom and panicked.

title: Hearbreak
lede: He was just heartbroken
story_texts: My best friend who is from Panama was dating a girl around 15 (He is 16); He loved her so much but all relationships end in heartbreak; He was going to meet up with his girlfriend only to notive her kissing another guy; He was hurt so he called his friend who was on vacation; After that day he was just so heartbroken he wouldn't talk to anyone; He closed himself off from the world but I helped him get better and he is happy again

title: Oily
lede: I struggled even more with doing my hair
story_texts: When I was younger, my hair was very long but as I went into puberty it became very oily so I cut it; I thought that if I cut it I could do my hair better; That was not true; I struggled even more with doing my hair especially if it was curly ; Also my face is always oily especially my nose and that can get very irritating

title: Bad cramps
lede: I have to take pain medicine
story_texts: When I first got my period, I thought I was bleeding because something was wrong; But it turned out to be my period; My first official period started on the last day of school when I was in 6th grade ; I never had cramps the first couple of years of having my period, but when I got to high school, it started happening occasionally; Eventually I started to get bad cramps every time I have my period and now I'm 15 years old; I have to take pain medicine for my cramps

title: Celebrity Dream
lede: I thought it was pee
story_texts: I had a dream with me and Selena Gomez; I woke up and I thought it was pee; I asked my dad and he told me everything

title: Dating is not for me now
lede: The way I show love is different
story_texts: In 8th grade I dated this boy in 9th grade. ; Now, I'm not from my current town so the way I show love is different. I also don't want someone that I can run over. ; I dated two other times but they were like little puppies.; Anyway, the 9th grade boy I was dating was sweet but he didn't tell me how he felt. He would always go to my friend and say something to her; Then he'd come to me and say "everything is fine"- no it's not. Also, he didn't make me happy so I broke up with him; I feel like I'm ready for a real relationship but nobody else it
link_title: Am I in a Healthy Relationship?

title: Growing Pains
lede: I just wish I would hit my growth spurt already
story_texts: Almost every day my knees are in pain; They swell randomly and I have to take ibuprofen to stop the swelling; The doctors keep saying it's because I have a lot of room left to grow; I just wish I would hit my growth spurt already
link_title: What a Pain! Kids and Growing Pains

title: PE incident
lede: I mean who wouldn't freak out
story_texts: Oh, so, this happened in 6th grade. In PE, we had just started to play indoor soccer which was fun; But, before starting another game someone had accidently elbowed with force into my stomach.; I asked the coach if I could go to the restroom; After going to the restroom, it turns out I started my period; At first, I actually freaked out because... I mean, who wouldn't freak out, bleeding from the stomach after being elbowed there?

title: No crushes
lede: I have never hever had a crush on anybody
story_texts: I don't like sharing things but I am very happy with my self appearance; I have never had a relationship because I have never ever had a crush on anybody; I have not met anybody so far in my life that I like like yet

title: Morning voice
lede: My voice can go low
story_texts: Back in 7th grade when I was just starting puberty, my voice was already deep but it kept cracking except for in the morning. ; In the morning, my voice was deeper than it usual; I sounded like I was trying to make my voice deeper on my own but I wasn't; My mom and brothers thought I was a different person.; Moral of the story, I learned my voice can go low

title: My family and my period
lede: I cried because I didn't know what to do
story_texts: I was 12 when I first got my period. ; It was scary because all of my cousins were at my house.; I cried because I didn't know what to do so I stayed in the bathroom until everyone left. ; My mom later came in and told me what to do.; When I told my dad he was shocked because he didn't know what to do.; But now I know how to track my period and know how to track my period, how to use pads, and what to do with cramps.

title: My bf and me
lede: He wants us to be together AFTER HIGH SCHOOL
story_texts: My boyfriend loves me so much and says he doesn't want to lose me; We have been together for several months now; He wants us to be together AFTER HIGH SCHOOL; I am not sure how that's gonna go; We're in middle school right now

title: Relationship issues
lede: My ex kept telling my girlfriend that I had several girlfriends
story_texts: I had a girlfriend and an ex-girlfriend and my ex-girlfriend didn't like my girlfriend; My girlfriend didn't know that my ex didn't like her since they were supposed to be best friends; My ex kept telling my girlfriend that I had several girlfriends and my girlfriend believed everything that she said about me; My girlfriend asked me if I had another girlfriend and I said no; I broke up with her because she kept believing my ex
link_title: It's not me, it's you: how to break up

title: Pressured for pictures
lede: I didn't mean for the pictures to get sent to a lot of people
story_texts: I showed my body to boys who were only temporary and now a lot of people know; I believe this is going to haunt me forever; I didn't mean for the pictures to get sent to a lot of people; I can never defend myself because they have access to my pictures; I don't want them to be on social media; I wish I could right my wrongs
link_title: Protecting your online identity and reputation

title: Dark marks
lede: When it is my time of month, I get really bad acne and the bumps hurt really badly
story_texts: I wash my face with soap and water every morning and night; When it is my time of month, I get really bad acne and the bumps hurt really badly; I just stay in the bed messing with them; Then I get dark marks on my face; They say that it will go away

title: The time I met my soulmate
lede: She was a cheerleader and I was just a water boy
story_texts: My story starts at a basketball game...she was a cheerleader and I was just a water boy; So there was this one game where I just felt like something  was going to happen today but I didn't know what; So that afternoon before the game started I went outside and she gave me the biggest hug ever; So after that we became friends and were talking for a while; Then we got together one day after school and that's when she told me she told me that she liked me ever since the start of basketbal season; And we have been together for 6 months

title: Relationship problems
lede: They either played me or weren't trustworthy
story_texts: Well, I've had good times and bad times in my relationships with a boyfriend; I've had a couple of boyfriends and none of them were good enough for me; They either played me or weren't trustworthy; So I know that boyfriends are nothing to me; All I need is myself; That's why I'm still single

title: Getting pimples
lede: It seems like every time I pop one another one appears
story_texts: I have pimples on my face and sometimes they hurt; They hurt when I try to pop them or get rid of them so I keep washing my face more and taking showers for a lot longer; Right now some are popping up on my face and I keep trying to pop them; It's working, but it seems like every time I pop one another one appears; I'm just gonna keep washing my face to get rid of them; Hopefully I don't get more soon

title: When it comes to an end
lede: At first I really wanted her but something changed
story_texts: I was in a relationship and we were together for a few months; At first I really wanted her but something changed; I couldn't understand the feeling at the time but each day it got worse and worse; I didn't want to be with her so I ended it; She really wanted to be with me but I knew we were better off as friends

title: Confidence
lede: I have been a victim of bullying for a long time
story_texts: I have been a victim of bullying for a long time; I thought I would never be smart enough or I was too fat or I wasn't the skin tone everyone wanted me to be; It took me a while to tell my parents; After I did they reminded me that I may not be what everyone wants me to be; But I have a purpose

title: Perseverance
lede: And when I woke up people had written "stupid", "ugly", and other names on me
story_texts: It all started when I was in elementary school in the 1st grade. I was bullied a lot. I used to get talked about, picked on, and even wrote on; People also used to hit me and give me bruises. I remember one day I was on the bus asleep and when I woke up people had written "stupid", "ugly", and other names on me; I was bullied all my life untile 6th grade; People were jealous of me but I pulled through and became successful in what I do; I never give up and you should see me now

title: Oh well...
lede: Then I saw a brown spot
story_texts: It was a cool Sunday morning. There were gloomy clouds in the air but not too gloomy; I had went to use the bathroom before getting ready for church. Then I saw a brown spot; I asked my mom what it was and she said she didn't know, but told me to tell her if I saw it again. We we went out to dinner that evening and when I went to the bathroom I saw the brown spot again (I had changed my underwear after the first sighting); I told my mother and she said, "Oh yeah, definitely your period," so she gave me a small pad and that night she taight me how to put on a pad and I was set to go; I wasn't scared of it, I didn't like that blood was coming out of me. I cramped a lot but that is life. I just had to learn that my period was going to be a reoccuring event that took place in my life so I accepted that

title: Very itchy
lede: Feels like fire üêúüêúüêú
story_texts: I shaved and it was very itchy and bumpy; I bought some razors and went to work; I cut myself a couple of times; Since my skin is sensitive it isn't my favorite thing to do; Feels like fire üêúüêúüêú; Tip: use baby oil after you shave (helps with irritation)

title: Never fall for it
lede: She was actually very controlling and didn't trust me with my friends
story_texts: I once liked a girl that was really pretty and very nice; But when we finally got fating for a while she wasn't the same girl I fell in love with; She was actually very controlling and didn't trust me with my friends; Just because someone looks nice doesn't mean they will treat you right; So find a person who loves the real you and cares about you and also trusts you; Without trust there really isn't a true relationship

title: Grass is always greener...
lede: I was so insecure about not having a big butt or breasts
story_texts: I have always been skinny and really self conscious about it.  ; I was so insecure about not having a big butt or breasts. ; My friend with really big breasts was constantly reminding me of it by saying, "You are so lucky.  I wish I had a flat chest." ; I wish big butts and breasts were not so pressured for girls to have today.  It is in so many magazines and broadcasted in songs. ; Everyone always says that bones are for dogs and thick and curvy women are "good." ; There is nothing wrong with curvy women, but you can't support one body type while bashing down another.
link_title: Why don't I like the way I look?

title: Freaked out
lede: I first thought it was discharge and I was scared I had a yeast infection or something
story_texts: Before I first got my period, I was always left out when my other friends would talk about their cramps or how when they sneezed they could feel blood coming out.  ; When I first got my period, I was going to day camp.  It was a forensic science camp.; Anyway, I went to the bathroom and I saw brown in my pants and I freaked out. ; I first thought it was discharge and I was scared I had a yeast infection or something.; I smelled it and it wasn't poop, so I called to tell my mom and I put on a pad that was from the cabinet in the bathroom.
link_title: Vaginal discharge: what's normal, what's not

title: Close the curtain
lede: All of the other girls looked
story_texts: At camp when I was 9, I was in the shower and a girl called my name and then thrust open the curtain open.  ; She knew I was in there.  ; All of the other girls looked.  ; The girl finally closed the curtain, and then everyone started laughing. ; Another girl said, "Look at her vagina!" because I had pubic hair at such a young age. ; It made me so sad.
link_title: Top signs girls are in puberty

title: Not a suprise
lede: I wanted it, but immediately after I got it, I decided I really didn't want it after all
story_texts: I got my first period when I was 11 years old.; I have two older sisters so it really wasn't a surprise when I got it.; I was at school and I went to the bathroom to pee.  When I pulled my pants down, there was blood on my underwear.; I knew what it was, so I got a pad from the bathroom cabinet.; When I got home I told my sister.  ; I wanted it, but immediately after I got it, I decided I really didn't want it after all.

title: There for her
lede: As her friends, we tried to just talk with her
story_texts: Well I had this friend who was upset because she was in a confusing romantic relationship. As her friends, we tried to just talk with her, trying to comfort her and make sure she knew we cared.; We really did just want her to know we were there for her, no matter what happened otherwise. The best way for us to do that was just talk with her, just let her know we were there.; She seemed to perk up a little, and seemed a little more confident afterwards.; I was just relieved she seemed better, I was just glad to help out in any way I could.; Although she was still a little worried about her relationship, she definitely did recover a little.; She knew we were going to be there for her,  and said so, and seemed happier.
link_title: How to be a good listener

title: Snapchat loss
lede: I Lost One Of My Close Friends Due To Something I Posted On Snapchat
story_texts: I Lost One Of My Close Friends Due To Something I Posted On Snapchat; She Felt Some Type Of Way Abt The Post But I Tried To Tell Her It Wasn't Directed To Her But She Didn't Believe Me So We Went Our Seperate Ways; I Felt Sad Because She Was My Friend And I Really Didnt Think She Would Have Took It Like That ; Even Though It Wasn't Directed To Her; I Learned That You Shouldn't Post Certain Things; You Should Keep Them To Yourself Because You Never Know Who You Might Hurt
link_title: How to talk to girls, boys, and everyone in between

title: Insta crush
lede: I Kinda Had Ah Crush On Him But I Never Told Him
story_texts: I Met This Guy On Instagram, I Kinda Had Ah Crush On Him But I Never Told Him; Sooo My Bestfriend And This Guy Would Always Joke Around With Eachother & One Day My Bestfriend Posted Something On Instagram And Tagged Me In It ; And He Commented And We All Just Started Joking ; And Then He Dm'ed Me And We Started Talking And Then He Asked For My Later And Like Some Days Later We Got Together; I Felt Good Because I Found Out That My Crush Liked Me Too The Whole Time
link_title: Social media is impacting IRL friendships

title: Small acts
lede: I would always end up being the only liking it
story_texts: When I had just joined musical.ly I followed a girl who I knew from school who I knew about and had talked to her once or twice but we were not really friends ; And whenever she posted something I would always end up being the only liking it which was weird because she was nice but I always ended up adding a nice comment to make her feel good and one day at school she thanked me ; then we started talking and now we are good friends.; At first I didn't even know the kid but then just this small act of kindness has made her feel good and make us friends.; I thought it was crazy that such small act of kindness could make a big difference in someones life.
link_title: How to use social media to build self-esteem

title: Friends no more
lede: I'm not good at talking in person because I can't express words
story_texts: Well this was actually recently me and a good friend had just decided we didn't want to be best friends anymore ; So as all my friends know I'm not good at talking in person because I can't express words so I was able to communicate through texting which was good; What happened was I told her what I thought should happen and that I hoped we could still treat each other with kindness and she told me what happened and why she was thinking the same thing and we worked it out; And now we're able to talk to each other kindly and still not be friends; It felt amazing to be able to not have to look into someone's eyes and say all that üòÇ ; And I felt like a million pounds had just been lifted off my chest.

title: Sister, sister
lede: She kept pressuring me though to do it
story_texts: I love my older sister, but we don't always see eye to eye; One time, she really wanted me to do this sport she had done and loved, but I had tried it and did not liked it. She kept pressuring me though to do it.; I was kinda upset, cause I didn't like that activity but she was making me unsure of what to do and I felt uncomfortable.; I wanted to avoid doing the sport; She wanted me to do it at all costs; We both countered each other and were stubborn and couldn't compromise. I ended up trying it out for one season which was fine. I wasn't pressured to do it again which was a relief
link_title: Choosing the right sport for you

title: Shade
lede: She repeatedly kissed a guy i used to talk to
story_texts: She repeatedly kissed a guy i used to talk to; i had just stopped talking to the guy and i fell hard for him.  i was more upset that she told one of my bestfriends not to tell me; She was scared that i was gonna freak out if i found out; I told her i was cutting her off cuz thats shady. She thought it was a joke; I was boiling with anger when she laughed in my face thinking it was a joke; Yes, bcuz thats how u end friendships. Some girls over step their boundaries and try to hide things from their friends and thats shady, don't nobody need friends like thatüíØ
link_title: What it means to be a friend

title: Models are models
lede: Appearance isn't everything
story_texts: I saw this photo of a really pretty model on social media one time; It kinda made me self conscious, like I'll never look that perfect.; Probably made me think about myself cause she looked so perfect and nobody ever seems to look that way in reality.; I try not to let perfect models affect how I see myself at all, even if it is sometimes intimidating.; Appearance isn't everything so I try not to let stuff like that bother me.
link_title: Fatphobia: totally real and totally damaging

title: Caged in
lede: I feel like she was holding me back from spreading my wings
story_texts: I remember the time my mom and I didn‚Äôt eye to eye with sports. She didn‚Äôt want sports to get in the way of her job. But that wasn‚Äôt the main reason. ; She didn‚Äôt trust others taking me home. It‚Äôs like she have so many assumptions in her mind. It‚Äôs really annoying.; We disagree on sports and me growing up. Sometimes I begin to think that she can‚Äôt let go of me.; It made me feel really angry and caged in. It‚Äôs like she wants me to stay by her all her life. I want to explore. If I explore I will grow as a better human being.; I just made my own plans and developments without her. I feel like she was holding me back from spreading my wings. Don‚Äôt get me wrong, I love till death. I just really wish our complications go away.; I wouldn‚Äôt say they've been solved to be honest. It‚Äôs more like I balanced things out because as I accomplish things on my own, they always have a flaw, so I need my mama too.
link_title: Why do I fight with my parents so much?

title: Picture perfect
lede: I have of habit of comparing myself to people
story_texts: The picture was of a girl with long hair and a fairly skinny body.; It made me feel sad and worthless.; I have of habit of comparing myself to people and not really accepting what I see in the mirror everyday.; It lowers my self esteem and others‚Äô self esteem.; Why?; Because we aim to want to be something we aren‚Äôt and they destroys our confidence and makes us not realize that we are perfect just the way we are.

title: Surprise
lede: I made an awkward first kiss even worse
story_texts: My first kiss, not including Kindergarten, was when I was 9 or 10.; I was in 5th or 6th grade.  I had my first kiss at a school dance.  This boy smelled terrible.; He kissed me and walked away.  And as he walked away, I blurted out, "You smell!" ; I made an awkward first kiss even worse.  He never spoke to me again.  ; It wasn't that I was trying to be mean, but it sort of spilled of my mouth before I thought that it would embarrass him in front of the school. ; It also completely caught me by surprise.

title: I care
lede: I have depression and don't want to her to beat herself up like I do
story_texts: I have a friend who is in my grade who has actually skipped a grade, and was in a math class with mostly juniors as a freshman.; She stayed in the class for about a week before getting bumped down a class, which is still impressive seeing she was still in a class with sophomores and juniors; I heard from a few of my friends that she was really mad and felt stupid.  Which was, well, stupid; Everyone said not to talk to her about it, but I couldn't shut my mouth.  As soon as I got the chance to talk to her about it, I did; I have depression and don't want to her to beat herself up like I do.  I told her truthfully that she is the smartest young woman I know along with telling her other things; I have no idea how she took that conversation, but my only hope is that she realizes how much I do care

title: Matti to Matt
lede: I respect people who genuinely work to call me Matt even if it is hard for them
story_texts: I always grew up with the name Matti and I‚Äôve always had to deal with people joking or saying ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs a girl‚Äôs name!‚Äù or just  assuming that name is childish or immature.; So eventually with the transition from middle to high school, I decided to change my name to Matt; It was really hard for a lot of people.  It still is but my close friends respect that change more than I could have imagined and I really like that!; Some people just refused to call me Matt and I‚Äôm still not sure if that is a lack of respect or just them getting too attached to what I was and don‚Äôt want me to change; Either way, I respect people who genuinely work to call me Matt even if it is hard for them

title: Oh brother (oh sister)
lede: I just want some privacy. Is that too much to ask?
story_texts: I am so sick of my little sister walking into my room whenever she wants to. ; When I kick her out, she always goes and tells. ; My dad says I should be nice, but I just want some privacy.; Is that too much to ask?  ; Sometimes I hate her.

title: Making the rules
lede: If I fail, I need to practice a lot for them.
story_texts: My parents are very strict to me.  They really don‚Äôt want me to play too much and always make rules for me. ; I feel a little bit stressed. ; If I don't obey the rules, they will make punishments for me.; I must always be in the top 3 students of the whole class.  If I fail, I need to practice a lot for them.  ;  I am not allowed to go outside and play for a whole weekend unless they make an appointment or entertainment for me.

title: Left out
lede: I don't think they even realized how much they were leaving me out
story_texts: I had a couple friends who would invite me places but then totally ignored me or kinda teased me the entire time.; It was really frustrating, like it'd just make me feel bad and left out.; I don't think they even realized how much they were leaving me out, they just did it, and had no clue it bothered me.; I talked to them a little, just saying like that I sometimes felt left out, and that we should try to compromise and not exclude anyone.; I don't think they 100% took me seriously but they made sure to include me a little more afterwards.; I felt relieved almost, just glad I talked to them about it. It was good that we talked cause even though they sorta disregarded me at least they began to have an idea of how I was feeling.

title: History
lede: She was so upset she wouldn‚Äôt talk to me, and wouldn‚Äôt acknowledge me no matter what
story_texts: My friend and I got in an argument because I looked at her computer history in history class; it had been an inside joke in our class that nobody could get on her history, and she got angry for a really small reason and wouldn‚Äôt let it go.; she was so upset she wouldn‚Äôt talk to me, and wouldn‚Äôt acknowledge me no matter what; I apologized a significant amout for invading her privacy and doing something like that without her permission.; but my friend deflected my apology and continued to ignore me, which really hurt; it felt good to get the problem off my chest, but it hurt that she wouldn‚Äôt talk as well. I think it was really important to talk about because this was one of my really good friends and I felt we needed to talk, but she wouldn‚Äôt.

title: Playing favorites
